headline: Should You Buy Nucor's Rallying Stock?
summary: Nucor is one of the largest steelmakers in the United States.  Nucor's stock has fallen by more than 45% from its peak, but it may have hit an inflection point.  Nucor (NYSE: NUE) is a large and diversified U.S. steelmaker.
